summary: Diff indicates updates to the GDD template and related project metadata. The file summary explicitly claims the "Competition & Market Dynamics" section (id: 'competition-mechanics') was expanded with the requested dedicated subsections and details. Due to truncation of `gddTemplate.ts`, the exact content cannot be directly verified from the provided excerpt, but the diff summary supports that REQ-12 was implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/summaries beyond the requested GDD template content change (e.g., project state/version text and frontend file summaries).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a GDD/spec text update in `frontend/src/lib/gddTemplate.ts` (section id `competition-mechanics`) and explicitly said no UI redesign/backend changes; modifying metadata summary files was not requested.
